Body:
I would like to use Node-Red on my RaspberryPi B 3+ with GrovePi, but I get the same error message every time again and again.

[node-red-contrib-grovepi/grovepi] Error: Cannot find module 'i2c-bus'

i2c is enabled in the raspi-config and I have everything installed that I've read on Node-Red/RPI Configuration.

Thanks to all!
If you don't update the question with the information I've asked for there is little we can do to help you
How did you install the Node-RED nodes? Also were there any errors when you did. I would suggest reinstalling the `node-red-contrib-grovepi` node.

@hardillb I'm sorry for the late answer. First I installed the nodes through npm on the console, that didn't solved the problem. So I removed them and installed them directly from localhost deploy , by going to Manage Palette" from the menu and I searched for GrovePi and installed the 3 nodes that were available. The `node-red-grovepi-nodes` worked but the `node-red-contrib-grovepi` doesn't
column9: and that is the one I need. It says [object Object] and "board-config""
